name: Revert
description:
Being trapped inside a simulated time loop, it is your task to survive as long as you can.

In the game, every 5 seconds will replay all of the previous shots. Furthermore, each wave will repeat itself by summoning the same types of enemies in the same positions while also summoning new types of enemies.

This is a submission to Brackey's Game Jam and it's theme; Rewind.

This was my first ever online Game Jam. I had a lot of fun creating this game. I hope you enjoy yourselfs for the time you spend in my game. Thank you.
